title: Froggy
medium:
Medium: polyester, cotton
Technique: printed by rotary screen on plain weave with paired warps
description: Half drop repeat of three brite green frogs surrounded by jonquils on a brite yellow background. Two frogs are hopping and the other sits with a pink flower in it's mouth. Lengths of fabric placed side by side continue pattern.
